report.title: User activity breakdown
report.description: A breakdown of record and species counts for a user.
report.query: select 1 as sort, 'Records' as count_of, count(distinct id) as total, count(distinct case when record_status='V' then id else null end) as confirmed, count(distinct case when cache_created_on>=now() - '1 month'::interval then id else null end) as month, count(distinct case when cache_created_on>=now() - '1 year'::interval then id else null end) as year from cache_occurrences where created_by_id=#user_id# union select 2 as sort, 'Species' as count_of, count(distinct coalesce(taxa_taxon_list_external_key, taxon_meaning_id::varchar)) as total, count(distinct case when record_status='V' then coalesce(taxa_taxon_list_external_key, taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as confirmed, count(distinct case when cache_created_on>=now() - '1 month'::interval then coalesce(taxa_taxon_list_external_key, taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as month, count(distinct case when cache_created_on>=now() - '1 year'::interval then coalesce(taxa_taxon_list_external_key, taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as year from cache_occurrences where created_by_id=#user_id# union select 3 as sort, 'Records I''ve verified' as count_of, count(distinct o.id) as total, count(distinct case when o.record_status='V' then o.id else null end) as confirmed, count(distinct case when o.created_on>=now() - '1 month'::interval then o.id else null end) as month, count(distinct case when o.created_on>=now() - '1 year'::interval then o.id else null end) as year from occurrences o join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id where verified_by_id=#user_id# and o.deleted=false and '#include_verified_by#'='1' group by count_of union select 4 as sort, 'Species I''ve verified' as count_of, count(distinct coalesce(cttl.external_key, taxon_meaning_id::varchar)) as total, count(distinct case when record_status='V' then coalesce(cttl.external_key, cttl.taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as confirmed, count(distinct case when o.created_on>=now() - '1 month'::interval then coalesce(cttl.external_key, cttl.taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as month, count(distinct case when o.created_on>=now() - '1 year'::interval then coalesce(cttl.external_key, cttl.taxon_meaning_id::varchar) else null end) as year from occurrences o join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id where verified_by_id=#user_id# and o.deleted=false and '#include_verified_by#'='1' group by count_of

param.name: include_verified_by
param.display: Include records verified by this user?
